text: Hi guys, do you know if it is possible to access the theme fields values from within a module? This seems like a pretty obvious thing to do to me but outputting {{ theme }} is empty so I guess its not in scope?
Hi <@U011VQUQJQZ> you can access the Theme settings values in custom modules

Hey guys,
does it also happen to you that the publish button of the field.json file in design manager does not work?

Hi guys, thanks for your responses. <@UHA0L28CW>, I can publish the fields.json although I have been using the CLI instead. <@UUX58C0S3>, that is strange, no matter what I do, it doesn't seem to return any data from it. I dont suppose you have an example of how you have used it? Thanks!

<@UUX58C0S3> I think I have it sussed out. I was using the block preview feature before and it was returning nothing but I have just created an actual website page and added the block to it and now it appears {{ theme }} is in scope, thanks anyway :smile:
here is what happens to me, and in all themes, both with chrome and with firefox

I have checked and in other issues everything is ok
strange, however, that I do not highlight any errors
SOLVED: i did a reverse to a previous version and everything works
